JavaScript

$('a').external();

CSS

a:hover.external{
	padding-right:14px;
	background:url("external.png") no-repeat right 3px #ffffcc;
	color:#ff00ff;
}

HTML

<div>
	<a href="?home">Home</a>
	<a href="?products">Products</a>
	<a href="?contact">Contact</a>
</div>
